meanings.definition: Excessive or unnecessary spending or behavior
meanings.sent1: Her extravagancies on designer clothes left her with little money for essentials.
meanings.sent2: His extravagancies knew no bounds when it came to luxury vacations.
meanings.sent3: The cat's extravagancies included demanding only imported gourmet cat food.
meanings.sent4: The extravagancies of the royal family were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The extravagancies of the wedding were so grand that they were talked about for years.

meanings.definition: The quality of being extravagant or excessive
meanings.sent1: The extravagancies of the mansion were evident in every lavish detail.
meanings.sent2: She admired the extravagancies of the elaborate decorations at the party.
meanings.sent3: The extravagancies of his storytelling made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The extravagancies of nature's beauty never fail to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: The extravagancies of the chef's creations delighted all the guests at the event.
